DOC.brief_summary: To assess paracervical block effective reduce discomfort placement intracervical laminaria pre-operative cervical preparation .
DOC.brief_title: Paracervical Block Pain Associated With Laminaria Insertion
DOC.detailed_description: Pre-operative dilation cervix use osmotic dilator ( e.g . laminaria , dilapan-S ) commonly do prior pregnancy termination make procedure safer . This study seek ass whether paracervical block effective reduce pain associate placement laminaria . Secondarily , study evaluate paracervical block effective reduce overall procedural pain increase overall patient satisfaction intracervical laminaria placement procedure .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman age 1849 year Desiring surgical termination pregnancy surgical management fetal demise Treatment plan involve cervical preparation laminaria Participant able provide inform consent English willing participate study Unable read/speak/understand English Contraindications receive lidocaine
